groups.note: period separated list, includes the pink groups

linked group.note: the id of the editor link group this object is in (link controls)

particle data.note: list separated by `a`, check above for properties in order

sound duration.note: affected by changing sfx, speed, start/end

sequence.note: period separated, similar to spawn remap
